data.comment: The match is underway at Craven Cottage.
Goal! Everton have got their heads in front thanks to a Dominic Calvert-Lewin strike.
In the minute 1, Great play from Richarlison to set up the goal.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Everton.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Everton to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Throw-in for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Andy Madley awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, Can Fulham capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Andy Madley signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to Everton's area.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 9, Harrison Reed for Fulham is whistled offside.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Fulham.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
Fulham drives forward and Ademola Lookman gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
In the minute 14, Andy Madley signals a Fulham throw-in in Everton's half.
Bobby Reid levels the score at 1-1.
Everton's Richarlison has run offside.
In the minute 18, Everton drive forward but Dominic Calvert-Lewin is judged offside.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In London Everton drive forward through Richarlison. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Everton.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
Fulham's Ivan Cavaleiro breaks free at Craven Cottage. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 25, Everton have a goal kick.
Ola Aina for Fulham drives towards goal at Craven Cottage. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Everton at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 28, In London, Ben Godfrey of Everton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Bobby Reid is booked for the home team.
Goal! Dominic Calvert-Lewin gives Everton a 1-2 lead.
In the minute 29, That's a fine assist from Lucas Digne.
Can Everton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fulham's half?
Corner awarded to Everton.
In the minute 32, Fulham advance rapidly upfield but Andy Madley blows for offside.
Andy Madley awards Everton a goal kick.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 35, Everton move into a 1-3 lead through a Abdoulaye Doucoure header.
Lucas Digne with an assist there.
Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in Everton.
Everton's Richarlison gets in a shot on goal at Craven Cottage. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Everton pushes forward through Richarlison, whose finish on goal is saved.
The first half has been concluded at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Craven Cottage.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Everton.
Everton's Richarlison is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 47, Fulham to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Fulham have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Fulham close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 56, Antonee Robinson (Fulham) has received a first yellow card.
Ademola Lookman gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fulham.
Andy Madley signals a Everton throw-in in Fulham's half.
In the minute 58, The home team have replaced Bobby Reid with Ruben Loftus-Cheek. This is the first substitution made today by Scott Parker.
Aleksandar Mitrovic is on a sub for Tom Cairney for Fulham.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Fulham.
Ivan Cavaleiro of Fulham smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 62, Throw-in high up the field for Fulham in London.
Free kick Fulham.
Throw-in for Everton at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Fulham in the half of Everton.
An attacking Fulham player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Fulham are awarded a penalty ... Ivan Cavaleiro botches the spot kick!
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Scott Parker (Fulham) is making a third substitution, with Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa replacing Mario Lemina.
Ruben Loftus-Cheek has the misfortune to make it 2-3 through an own goal.
In the minute 70, Ademola Lookman instrumental with a fine assist.
Everton are whistled for offside.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Fulham needs to be cautious. Everton have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 74, Tom Davies is replacing James Rodriguez for the away team.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
In the minute 75, Andy Madley awards the away team a throw-in.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Carlo Ancelotti is making the team's second substitution at Craven Cottage with Gylfi Sigurdsson replacing Richarlison.
In the minute 77, Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 79, Andy Madley signals a Fulham throw-in in Everton's half.
Everton needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Everton.
In London Fulham drive forward through Aleksandar Mitrovic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Fulham.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Fulham.
Free kick for Everton in the half of Fulham.
Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Craven Cottage the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Everton.
Throw-in for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andy Madley awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
That's full-time at Craven Cottage. The final score is 2-3.
